titleStmt.title: An epistle concerning baptism. [occai]sionally written upon the sight [of] two treatises published by Thomas James father of a Presbyterian congre[ga]tion at Ashford in Kent : who [ha]th reflected upon the baptized [C]hristians / [by] [W]illiam Russell.
titleStmt.author: Russel, William.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages have faded print and are tightly bound with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
